body:
less active from now on because I'm gettig a bit bored with PvP,probably becuase not the best and die quite a bit to ppl who spend loads of time on it, so back to the point going to be less active on avicus. 

Intsead I'm going to start bulding abit and go on other games a bit more, you may see me on walls looking at stuff for map infomation or just playing with friends occasionally.

I'll be n the forms posting maps etc but apart from that you may not see me so much, thank you all this is by far the best server I've been on , thankyou for being so kind and welcoming t me.

-Whale
